title: Non-invasive imaging technique valid for identifying small airway disease in lung

title_detail.value: Non-invasive imaging technique valid for identifying small airway disease in lung

summary: Landmark study confirms ability of non-invasive imaging technique to identify early signs of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
